mapper.select: SELECT eventid, restaurantid, votes FROM fvb_eventRestaurant WHERE eventid = #{eventId} AND restaurantid = #{restaurantId}

SELECT R.restaurantid, R.restaurantname, R.city, R.address, R.phone, R.rating, R.yelpurl, R.imgurl, ER.votes FROM fvb_eventRestaurant AS ER, fvb_restaurant AS R WHERE eventid = #{eventId} AND R.restaurantid = ER.restaurantid
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fvb_eventRestaurant WHERE eventid = #{eventId} AND restaurantid = #{restaurantId}
mapper.update: UPDATE fvb_eventRestaurant SET votes = votes + 1 WHERE eventid = #{eventId} AND restaurantid = #{restaurantId}
